text: He read every prayer in every Bible, every holy book, prayed to every god, and was a zoologist, an idolater, a polytheist, a monotheist... all day long devoted to all cults. And he died, and as he entered the realm of shadows he found a god who was not mentioned in any of his theogonies, a strange and silent god who took him and loved him in the common mass, again in the common mud. FIN
title: El fanático de Dios
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
